CREATE PROCEDURE Announcement.SelectCurrentAnnouncementsFor @FacilityId int, @RolesList varchar(max), @CurrentDate datetime AS BEGIN
SELECT Announcements.Id, Announcements.StopDate, Announcements.Description, Announcements.Author, Announcements.SaveDate, AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities.FacilityId, AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities.RoleId FROM Announcement.AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities, Announcement.Announcements WHERE StopDate >= @CurrentDate AND FacilityId = @FacilityId AND RoleId IN ( SELECT item from Utility.ArrayToTable(Utility.StringToArray(@RolesList,',')) ) AND Announcements.Id = AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities.AnnouncementId ORDER BY Announcements.Id, FacilityId, RoleId
END
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON Announcement.SelectCurrentAnnouncementsFor FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE Announcement.SelectCurrentAnnouncementsFor;
